thread.title: Ho Chi Minh City to Sydney/ Melbourne for Only 880k VND or ~AUD $50 (Excluding Taxes and Fees)
thread.title_full: Ho Chi Minh City to Sydney/ Melbourne for Only 880k VND or ~AUD $50 (Excluding Taxes and Fees)

author: HenryGalilei
title: Ho Chi Minh City to Sydney/ Melbourne for Only 880k VND or ~AUD $50 (Excluding Taxes and Fees)
text:
Ho Chi Minh City to Sydney/ Melbourne for Only 880k VND or ~AUD $50 (Excluding Taxes and Fees) 46 0 HenryGalilei on 31/03/2017 - 14:47 www.jetstar.com (1843 clicks) Last edited 31/03/2017 - 17:05 by 3 other users 
Found this great deal from Jetstar pacific of Vietnam 
The DEAL start from 11am 31/3/2017 to 23:59 2/4/17 local time which is 3PM 31/3/17 AEST to 3:59AM 3/4/17 For the flight start from 11 May - 22 June 2017 - there is no information about whether it is a direct flight or not, but it should be a direct flight since on 11/5 Jetstar Pacific launches a direct flight from Ho Chi Minh City To Syd/Melb. The fare is 880,000VND = ~AUD 50 for a single ticket with 7kg of handbag and excludes tax 
Grab a ticket as soon as you can 
Good Luck to all 3 Apr 3:59am 3 days left Related Store: Jetstar Airways
